text: Kintu jitia moi taikhan susamachar laga hosa kotha namani kene thaka dikhise, moi Cephas ke taikhan sob laga majote koise, “Apuni jodi Yehudi ase hoile bhi apuni Porjati manu nisena thaki ase, aru Yehudi manu nisena thaka nai, titia hoile apuni Porjati khan ke apuni nisena thaki bole kineka kobole paribo?”
